markdownRemark.html: Located in the beautiful village of Colmenar, this language school offers intensive and non-intensive Spanish, English, French and German language courses. Lessons can be done privately or in groups. They also facilitate conversation classes and a library service.

frontmatter.title: Axalingua Language Center
frontmatter.description: Axalingua Language Center - Located in the beautiful village of Colmenar, this language school offers intensive and non-intensive Spanish, English, French and German language courses. Lessons can be done privately or in groups. They also facilitate conversation classes and a library service.
